id.comment: select all stmts

query.querystr: stmt s; read r; print pn; while w; if ifs; assign a; variable v; constant c; procedure p; Select s

id.comment: select all read

query.querystr: stmt s; read r; print pn; while w; if ifs; assign a; variable v; constant c; procedure p; Select r

id.comment: select all print

query.querystr: stmt s; read r; print pn; while w; if ifs; assign a; variable v; constant c; procedure p; Select pn

id.comment: select all while

query.querystr: stmt s; read r; print pn; while w; if ifs; assign a; variable v; constant c; procedure p; Select w

id.comment: select all if

query.querystr: stmt s; read r; print pn; while w; if ifs; assign a; variable v; constant c; procedure p; Select ifs

id.comment: select all assign

query.querystr: stmt s; read r; print pn; while w; if ifs; assign a; variable v; constant c; procedure p; Select a

id.comment: select all variable

query.querystr: stmt s; read r; print pn; while w; if ifs; assign a; variable v; constant c; procedure p; Select v

id.comment: select all constants

query.querystr: stmt s; read r; print pn; while w; if ifs; assign a; variable v; constant c; procedure p; Select c

id.comment: select all procedures

query.querystr: stmt s; read r; print pn; while w; if ifs; assign a; variable v; constant c; procedure p; Select p

id.comment: select all call

query.querystr: call call; read r; print pn; while w; if ifs; assign a; variable v; constant c; procedure p; Select call

id.comment: Next, select boolean for prog lines belonging to different procedures

query.querystr: stmt s; read r; print pn; while w; if ifs; assign a; variable v; constant c; procedure p; Select BOOLEAN such that Next (1,11)

id.comment: Next, select synonym for prog lines belonging to same procedure

query.querystr: stmt s; read r; print pn; while w; if ifs; assign a; variable v; constant c; procedure p; Select BOOLEAN such that Next (1,2)

id.comment: Next, select tuple for prog lines belonging to same procedure

query.querystr: stmt s; read r; print pn; while w; if ifs; assign a; variable v; constant c; procedure p; Select < a > such that Next* (1,2) pattern a(_,"200-20 ")

id.comment: select clauses in different order but same result

query.querystr: assign a; while w; Select a such that Modifies (a, "b") and Parent* (w, a) and Next* (59, a)

id.comment: select clauses in different order but same result

query.querystr: stmt s; read r; print pn; while w; if ifs; assign a; variable v; constant c; procedure p; Select a such that Parent* (w, a) and Modifies (a, "b") such that Next* (59, a)

id.comment: select clauses in different order but same result

query.querystr: stmt s; read r; print pn; while w; if ifs; assign a; variable v; constant c; procedure p; Select a such that Next* (59, a) and Parent* (w, a) and Modifies (a, "b")

id.comment: select clauses in different order but same result

query.querystr: stmt s; read r; print pn; while w; if ifs; assign a; variable v; constant c; procedure p; Select a pattern a ("b", _) such that Parent* (w, a) such that Next* (59, a)

id.comment: select clauses in different order but same result

query.querystr: stmt s; read r; print pn; while w; if ifs; assign a; variable v; constant c; procedure p; Select a such that Parent* (w, a) and Next* (59, a) pattern a ("b", _)

id.comment: select clauses in different order but same result

query.querystr: stmt s; read r; print pn; while w; if ifs; assign a; variable v; constant c; procedure p; Select a such that Next* (59, a) and Parent* (w, a) pattern a ("b", _)

id.comment: syntactically incorrect query, and should not be used to connect or introduce clauses of different types

query.querystr: stmt s; read r; print pn; while w; if ifs; assign a; variable v; constant c; procedure p; Select a such that Parent* (w, a) and Modifies (a, "b") and such that Next* (1, a)

id.comment: syntactically incorrect query and should not be used to connect or introduce clauses of different types

query.querystr: stmt s; read r; print pn; while w; if ifs; assign a; variable v; constant c; procedure p; Select a such that Parent* (w, a) and pattern a ("b", _) such that Next* (1, a)

id.comment: syntactically incorrect query and should not be used to connect or introduce clauses of different types

query.querystr: stmt s; read r; print pn; while w; if ifs; assign a; variable v; constant c; procedure p; Select a such that Parent* (w, a) pattern a ("b", _) and Next* (1, a)

id.comment: select tuple that modifies variable y

query.querystr: procedure p, q; assign a, a1; while w; variable v; prog_line n1, n2; Select <p, q> such that Modifies (w, "x")
query.stuans: h h,g h,e h,c h,f h,j h,d h,b h,i h,a h,h g,g g,e g,c g,f g,j g,d g,b g,i g,a g,h e,g e,e e,c e,f e,j e,d e,b e,i e,a e,h c,g c,e c,c c,f c,j c,d c,b c,i c,a c,h f,g f,e f,c f,f f,j f,d f,b f,i f,a f,h j,g j,e j,c j,f j,j j,d j,b j,i j,a j,h d,g d,e d,c d,f d,j d,d d,b d,i d,a d,h b,g b,e b,c b,f b,j b,d b,b b,i b,a b,h i,g i,e i,c i,f i,j i,d i,b i,i i,a i,h a,g a,e a,c a,f a,j a,d a,b a,i a,a a
query.correct: a a,a b,a c,a d,a e,a f,a g,a h,a i,a j,b a,b b,b c,b d,b e,b f,b g,b h,b i,b j,c a,c b,c c,c d,c e,c f,c g,c h,c i,c j,d a,d b,d c,d d,d e,d f,d g,d h,d i,d j,e a,e b,e c,e d,e e,e f,e g,e h,e i,e j,f a,f b,f c,f d,f e,f f,f g,f h,f i,f j,g a,g b,g c,g d,g e,g f,g g,g h,g i,g j,h a,h b,h c,h d,h e,h f,h g,h h,h i,h j,i a,i b,i c,i d,i e,i f,i g,i h,i i,i j,j a,j b,j c,j d,j e,j f,j g,j h,j i,j j

id.comment: select all combi of read and print statements if procedure g calls procedure d

query.querystr: procedure p, q; assign a, a1; while w; variable v; prog_line n1, n2; read r; if ifs; print pn; Select <ifs, pn> such that Calls ("g", "d")

id.comment: Calls, return TRUE if there is a procedure that calls other procedure

query.querystr: procedure p, q; assign a, a1; while w; variable v; prog_line n1, n2; Select BOOLEAN such that Calls (_,_)

id.comment: select all assignment statements if statement 112 is assignment statement

query.querystr: procedure p, q; assign a, a1; while w; variable v; prog_line n1, n2; Select a1 with 112 = a.stmt#

id.comment: select all assignment statements if statement 112 is assignment statement

query.querystr: procedure p, q; assign a, a1; while w; variable v; prog_line n1, n2; Select a1 with a.stmt# = 112

id.comment: Meaningless query, should still return TRUE

query.querystr: procedure p, q; assign a, a1; while w; variable v; prog_line n1, n2; Select BOOLEAN with 12 = 12

id.comment: If statement 12 is an assignment statement, return true

query.querystr: procedure p, q; assign a, a1; while w; variable v; prog_line n1, n2; Select BOOLEAN with a.stmt# = 12

id.comment: Calls, invalid query since parameter contains synonym that is not type procedure

query.querystr: procedure p, q; assign a, a1; while w; variable v; prog_line n1, n2; print pn; Select q such that Calls (pn, q)

id.comment: Calls, select procedures that call procedure f

query.querystr: procedure p, q; assign a, a1; while w; variable v; prog_line n1, n2; print pn; Select p such that Calls (p, "f")

id.comment: Calls*, select procedures that indirectly calls f

query.querystr: procedure p, q; assign a, a1; while w; variable v; prog_line n1, n2; print pn; Select p such that Calls* (p, "f")

id.comment: Calls*, return TRUE if procedure j indirectly calls b

query.querystr: procedure p, q; assign a, a1; while w; variable v; prog_line n1, n2; print pn; Select BOOLEAN such that Calls* ("j", "b")

id.comment: Calls*, return TRUE if procedure d indirectly calls g

query.querystr: procedure p, q; assign a, a1; while w; variable v; prog_line n1, n2; print pn; Select BOOLEAN such that Calls* ("d", "g")

id.comment: Next*, select tuple if Next relation is true

query.querystr: procedure p, q; assign a, a1; while w; variable v; prog_line n1, n2; print pn; Select <p,w> such that Next* (39, 46)

id.comment: Assignment, select assignment statements that has subexpression 90 + 40

query.querystr: procedure p, q; assign a, a1; while w; variable v; prog_line n1, n2; print pn; Select a pattern a(_,_"90+40"_)

id.comment: Assignment, select assignment statements that has subexpression (90 + 40)

query.querystr: procedure p, q; assign a, a1; while w; variable v; prog_line n1, n2; print pn; Select a pattern a(_,_"(90+40)"_)

id.comment: Assignment, select assignment statements that has subexpression d*a/b

query.querystr: procedure p, q; assign a, a1; while w; variable v; prog_line n1, n2; print pn; Select a pattern a(_,_"d*a/b"_)

id.comment: Assignment, select assignment statements that has subexpression f+d*a/b

query.querystr: procedure p, q; assign a, a1; while w; variable v; prog_line n1, n2; print pn; Select a pattern a(_,_"f+d*a/b"_)

id.comment: If pattern, return statements that are if statement and use variable(s) in condition

query.querystr: if ifs; while w; Select ifs pattern ifs(_,_,_)

id.comment: While pattern, return statements that are while statement and use variable(s) in condition

query.querystr: if ifs; while w; Select w pattern w(_,_)

id.comment: If pattern,return tuple of if statement with control variable and the control variable

query.querystr: if ifs; while w; variable v; Select <ifs, v> pattern ifs(v,_,_)

id.comment: While pattern,return tuple of while statement with control variable and the control variable

query.querystr: if ifs; while w; variable v; Select <w, v> pattern w(v,_)

id.comment: Find statements that follow 77

query.querystr: prog_line n; stmt s; Select s.stmt# such that Follows* (s, n) with n=77

id.comment: Invalid query

query.querystr: prog_line n; stmt s, s1; Select s.stmt# such that Follows* (s, s1) with s1.stmt#=n and n=77

id.comment: Find while loops with assignment to variable f

query.querystr: assign a; while w; Select w such that Parent* (w, a) pattern a ("f", _)

id.comment: Find assignments that use and modify the same variable

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; Select a such that Uses (a, v) pattern a (v, _)

id.comment: Find assignments that use and modify the variable a

query.querystr: assign a; while w; Select a pattern a ("a", _) such that Uses (a, "a")

id.comment: Find assignments that use and modify the variable a

query.querystr: assign a; while w; Select a pattern a ("a", _) such that Uses (a, "a")

id.comment: Find assignments that are nested directly or indirectly in a while loop and modify the variable b

query.querystr: assign a; while w; Select a such that Parent* (w, a) pattern a ("b", _)

id.comment: Find assignments that are nested directly or indirectly in a while loop and modify the variable b

query.querystr: assign a; while w; Select a pattern a ("b", _) such that Parent* (w, a)

id.comment: Find procedures in the program that call another procedure

query.querystr: procedure p, q; Select p.procName such that Calls (p, q)

id.comment: Find procedures that directly call procedure c and modify variable x

query.querystr: procedure p, q; Select p such that Calls (p, q) with q.procName = "c" such that Modifies (p, "x")

id.comment: Find procedures that are called from d in a while loop

query.querystr: procedure p; call c; while w; Select p such that Calls ("d", p) and Parent (w, c) with c.procName = p.procName

id.comment: Return TRUE if there is an execution path from statement 71 to 70

query.querystr: Select BOOLEAN such that Next* (71, 70)

id.comment: Return TRUE if there an execution path from statement 13 to 12 that passes through 17

query.querystr: Select BOOLEAN such that Next* (13, 12) and Next* (13, 17)

id.comment: Find assignments to variable l located in a loop, that can be reached from statement 11

query.querystr: assign a; while w; Select a pattern a ("l", _) such that Parent* (w, a) and Next* (11, a)

id.comment: Find all statements whose statement number is equal to some constant

query.querystr: stmt s; constant c; Select s with s.stmt# = c.value

id.comment: Find procedures whose name is the same as the name of some variable

query.querystr: stmt s; procedure p; variable v; Select p with p.procName = v.varName

id.comment: Find three while loops nested one in another

query.querystr: while w1, w2, w3; Select <w1, w2, w3> such that Parent* (w1, w2) and Parent* (w2, w3)

id.comment: Find all assignments with variable ab on the left, located in some while loop, and that can be reached from line 105

query.querystr: assign a; while w; prog_line n; Select a such that Parent* (w, a) and Next* (60, n) pattern a("ab", _) with a.stmt# = n

id.comment: Find all while statements with c as a control variable

query.querystr: while w; Select w pattern w ("c", _)

id.comment: Invalid query as right hand side of pattern while should only be wildcard

query.querystr: while w; Select w pattern w ("c", "c")
